member.name: EncoderValue
member.summary: The EncoderValue enumeration specifies values that can be passed as arguments to image encoders. For more information about image encoders, see Using Image Encoders and Decoders .

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueColorTypeCMYK
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueColorTypeYCCK
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueCompressionLZW
member.summary: For a TIFF image, specifies the LZW compression method.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueCompressionCCITT3
member.summary: For a TIFF image, specifies the CCITT3 compression method.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueCompressionCCITT4
member.summary: For a TIFF image, specifies the CCITT4 compression method.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueCompressionRle
member.summary: For a TIFF image, specifies the RLE compression method.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueCompressionNone
member.summary: For a TIFF image, specifies no compression.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueScanMethodInterlaced
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueScanMethodNonInterlaced
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueVersionGif87
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueVersionGif89
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueRenderProgressive
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueRenderNonProgressive
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueTransformRotate90
member.summary: For a JPEG image, specifies lossless 90-degree clockwise rotation.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueTransformRotate180
member.summary: For a JPEG image, specifies lossless 180-degree rotation.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueTransformRotate270
member.summary: For a JPEG image, specifies lossless 270-degree clockwise rotation.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueTransformFlipHorizontal
member.summary: For a JPEG image, specifies a lossless horizontal flip.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueTransformFlipVertical
member.summary: For a JPEG image, specifies a lossless vertical flip.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueMultiFrame
member.summary: Specifies multiple-frame encoding.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueLastFrame
member.summary: Specifies the last frame of a multiple-frame image.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueFlush
member.summary: Specifies that the encoder object is to be closed.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueFrameDimensionTime
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueFrameDimensionResolution
member.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

member.name: EncoderValue.EncoderValueFrameDimensionPage
member.summary: For a TIFF image, specifies the page frame dimension
